thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: James Garland

author: James Garland
title: James Garland
text: We are a service provider, most of our time spent with clients, advising, developing campaigns and executing marketing and more. We are constantly on the move. The Servcorp team at 101 Collins St, Melbourne are sensational, the model is flexible, we can work interstate at no cost and our clients are endlessly impressed with the office and our Virtual Office team who support us. It's extremely cost-effective and I can't see us every going back to the traditional model.
